property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: Sells [[items]] in their shop. Taking a picture of them rewards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: An item available in the [[Pippins]]'s shop for 250 [[POINT]]s. Since keys have no function on the Island Board, it is immediately discarded on purchase, after which the Pippins flees.

property.name: page
property.value: Key (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: An [[item]] available in the [[Pippins]]'s shop for 400 [[POINT]]s. If the [[Key (The Legend of Tenna)|Key]] is bought, this item is available for free.

property.name: page
property.value: TV Dinner

property.name: description
property.value: Sells the [[Rouxls Block]] in his shop. Taking a picture of him deducts 1 [[POINT]].

property.name: description
property.value: An [[item]] available in [[Rouxls Kaard]]'s shop for 1 [[POINT]].

property.name: page
property.value: Rouxls Block

property.name: description
property.value: Offers a view of the Atlantis Stadium for 10 [[POINT]]s. After taking a look, [[Susie]] throws the binoculars into the water.

property.name: description
property.value: Sells [[Lancer]] in their shop. Taking a picture of them awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Gives away a [[Ribbon (The Legend of Tenna)|ribbon]] in their shop.

property.name: description
property.value: Gives away a [[Ribbon (The Legend of Tenna)|ribbon]] and the [[Pizza Deodorant (For Nerds)]] in their shop.

property.name: description
property.value: Houses three pedestals that hold three [[Grand Photo]]s, which are used to unlock the raft that can take the [[party]] to the ocean.

property.name: page
property.value: Island Board#Kodakoda Shrine

property.name: description
property.value: A heart-shaped island. Upon interacting with the red tree, the trees flash a rainbow color and fly upwards.

property.name: description
property.value: Entering this pyramid transports the [[party]] to the Rock Video set.

property.name: page
property.value: Rock Video

property.name: description
property.value: A leftover from the [[Original Game]]. Can only be accessed if [[Tenna]] is away from the game room. Upon entering this area, [[Susie]] and [[Ralsei]] provide commentary on the area.

property.name: page
property.value: Island Board#North

property.name: description
property.value: A minigame involving pushing a lawnmower over grass tiles to gain [[POINT]]s.

property.name: page
property.value: Island Board#Lawnmower Minigame

property.name: description
property.value: A puzzle that [[Susie]] solves automatically.

property.name: description
property.value: A [[camera]] roadblock that can be removed by taking a picture of it.

property.name: description
property.value: A puzzle involving constructing a bridge across the lake. Upon entering this room, [[Susie]] switches out her and [[Kris]]'s controller ports, allowing Kris to solve the puzzle using [[HERO_AXE]].

property.name: page
property.value: Island Board#Water Puzzle

property.name: description
property.value: A puzzle that [[Susie]] solves automatically if she is controlling [[HERO_AXE]].

property.name: page
property.value: Island Board#Water Puzzle

property.name: description
property.value: As the [[party]] enters this area, [[Tenna]] receives a phone call and leaves the game room.

property.name: description
property.value: After the enemy encounter, [[Susie]] switches her and [[Ralsei]]'s controller ports, causing Susie to take control of [[HERO_SCARF]] and Ralsei to take control of [[HERO_SWORD]]. Ralsei asks Kris if they want to return to normal or leave the arrangement as is for now.

property.name: description
property.value: Upon pressing this button, many bombs are revealed. If the controllers are switched, [[Susie]] changes them back to normal. Susie automatically triggers the bombs, opening the exits to the south and west.

property.name: description
property.value: Upon entering this room from the east, [[Tenna]] returns to the game room.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Tenna]] repeatedly attempts to direct the [[party]] away from this area. Upon reaching the area, he abruptly transports the party back to the entrance to the [[Shuttah]] cave and blocks the way back up.

property.name: description
property.value: Upon entering this area with [[Elnina (The Legend of Tenna)|Elnina]]/[[Lanino (The Legend of Tenna)|Lanino]], it is revealed that [[Rouxls Kaard]] has paired up with [[Lanino]]/[[Elnina]] in the other's absence. The three agree to form a "throuple" and construct the rainbow bridge to the Atlantis Stadium.

property.name: description
property.value: Directs the [[party]] to [[Island Board#Kodakoda Shrine|Kodakoda Shrine]]. Taking a picture of him using the [[camera]] awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Provides a hint on the [[Grand Photo]] that can be obtained from the cactus on the western part of the island. Taking a picture of them awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Provides a hint on the [[Grand Photo]] that can be obtained by having [[Lancer]] dig up the green geyser. Taking a picture of them awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Provides a hint on the [[Grand Photo]] that can be obtained from the torn flower on the eastern part of the island. Taking a picture of them awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Provides a hint on the [[Grand Photo]] that can be obtained from the red antlion in one of the caves. Taking a picture of them awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: A pair of [[Pippins]]. They offer the [[party]] to play a money-making game, to [[Tenna]]'s objection. They flee shortly afterward.

property.name: description
property.value: A total of four blue antlions. Taking a picture of them rewards 10 [[POINT]]s each.

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Elnina]] was favored during her battle, she appears here, searching for her lost lover.

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Lanino]] was favored during his battle, he appears here, searching for his lost lover.

property.name: description
property.value: A camera on a [[Shuttah]] pedestal. Can be used to take photos throughout the board.

property.name: description
property.value: Upon bringing [[Lancer]] to this location, he can dig out the green geyser and unlock a pathway to the west. Lancer serves as one of the four Grand Photos.

property.name: page
property.value: Grand Photo

property.name: description
property.value: A total of 180 POINTs can be collected from this room.

property.name: description
property.value: Taking a picture of this cactus awards a Grand Photo.

property.name: page
property.value: Grand Photo

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Elnina]] was favored in their battle, Lanino appears here and can be collected as an item to be taken to [[Island Board#Lover's Peak|Lover's Peak]]. Taking a picture of him awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: page
property.value: Lanino (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Lanino]] was favored in their battle, Elnina appears here and can be collected as an item to be taken to [[Island Board#Lover's Peak|Lover's Peak]]. Taking a picture of her awards 10 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: page
property.value: Elnina (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: Lancer is available as an [[item]] for 999 [[POINT]]s. By taking a picture of the rug, the price can be lowered to 9 POINTs.

property.name: description
property.value: A cosmetic item that [[Kris]] can equip to [[HERO_AXE]], to [[Susie]]'s objection.

property.name: page
property.value: Ribbon (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: A cosmetic item that [[Kris]] can equip to [[HERO_AXE]], to [[Susie]]'s objection. If Kris idles for long enough, Susie, controlling [[HERO_SWORD]], can make [[Ralsei]] equip the item to [[HERO_SCARF]].

property.name: description
property.value: Taking a picture of the torn flower rewards a Grand Photo. [[Ralsei]] takes this photo automatically if he is controlling [[HERO_SWORD]].

property.name: page
property.value: Grand Photo

property.name: description
property.value: Taking a picture of the red antlion rewards a Grand Photo.

property.name: page
property.value: Grand Photo

property.name: description
property.value: Moss on the wall. [[Kris]] automatically consumes the moss.

property.name: description
property.value: A cosmetic [[item]] that [[Kris]] can equip to [[HERO_SWORD]].

property.name: page
property.value: Ribbon (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Shadowguy]] pops out from a random tree and shoots at the [[party]]. Taking a picture of the bullet awards 1 [[POINT]], and taking a picture of the Shadowguy awards 10 POINTs. After five pictures are taken, the Shadowguy is replaced with a bunny-eared Shadowguy that awards 25 POINTs if a picture is taken of it.

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Shadowguy]] pops out from a random tree and shoots at the [[party]]. Taking a picture of the bullet awards 1 [[POINT]], and taking a picture of the Shadowguy awards 10 POINTs.

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter consisting of two [[Pippins]].

property.name: description
property.value: Attacks the party after obtaining [[Elnina (The Legend of Tenna)|Elnina]]/[[Lanino (The Legend of Tenna)|Lanino]].

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter consisting of three [[Pippins]].
